datasets.name: top_screen_views_dataset
queryLines:
WITH top_screens AS (
  SELECT
    screen,
    COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) as unique_screen_views,
    RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) DESC) as rank
  FROM hpx_events_model
  WHERE
    event_date_time >= '2023-05-01'
    AND screen NOT IN ('home', 'welcome', 'welcomecontainer', 'welcome-core', 'support')
    AND ui_action = 'screendisplayed'
  GROUP BY screen
  ORDER BY unique_screen_views DESC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT
  ts.screen,
  DATE_TRUNC('DAY', e.event_date_time) as daily_event_date,
  COUNT(DISTINCT e.device_id) as unique_screen_views
FROM hpx_events_model e
JOIN top_screens ts ON e.screen = ts.screen
WHERE
  e.event_date_time >= '2023-05-01'
  AND e.ui_action = 'screendisplayed'
GROUP BY ts.screen, DATE_TRUNC('DAY', e.event_date_time)
ORDER BY daily_event_date, unique_screen_views DESC

frame.title: Top Unique Screen Views (excl. Home/Welcome) Over Time
